creditline: Gift of Lora and Martin G. Weinstein
description: three figures in front of a narrow wooden walkway between two brick buildings; girl at L wearing zippered sweatshirt and carrying plastic bag; boy with shaved head at center wearing sweatshirt printed, "GHOLO (?) BOY"; seated smoking boy at R, wearing sweatshirt printed, "FELIX"
signed: at bottom edge on back, in pencil: [Kids standing on steps, Pilsen neighborhood, Chicago 1999, Thomas Frederick Arndt]
title: Kids Standing on Steps, Pilsen Neighborhood, Chicago
